    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Establishes a connection for the device and IoT Hub given in the client configuration. If the connection is already open, the function shall do nothing.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a connection could not to be established.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the connection. After the connection is closed, it is no longer usable. If the connection is already closed, the function shall do nothing.

      • sendEvent

        public IotHubStatusCode sendEvent(Message message)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sends an event message.
        Parameters:
        message - the event message.
        Returns:
        the status code from sending the event message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the MqttIotHubConnection is not open

      • receiveMessage

        public Message receiveMessage()
                       throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Receives a message, if one exists.
        Returns:
        the message received, or null if none exists.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the connection state is currently closed.
        java.io.IOException - if receiving on any of messaging clients fail.
